Q_NAME: Encoding of a Message Using Matrix Multiplicatio
Q_DESC: Write a program to Perform Encoding of a Message Using Matrix Multiplication
TESTCASE_1:
Enter the base of squared matrices
2
Enter the elements of matrix to be encoded: 
1 5
3 9
The Encoded matrix is:
5 11 
9 21
